sources.title: A Bully Romance (1939)
sources.description: Gandy Goose goes to Mexico and falls in love with a beautiful senorita. But her father objects and, hoping to get rid of what he thinks is an unsuitable suitor, forces Gandy into fighting a bull. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-bully-romance-1939/

metadata.Plot: Gandy Goose goes to Mexico and falls in love with a beautiful senorita. But her father objects and, hoping to get rid of what he thinks is an unsuitable suitor, forces Gandy into fighting a bull.
